com.linecorp.armeria.client.retry

Interface Backoff

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackoffWrapper
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Backoff
    Control back off between attempts in a single retry operation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Backoff exponential(long minIntervalMillis, long maxIntervalMillis)
      Returns a Backoff that waits an exponentially-increasing amount of time between attempts.
      static Backoff exponential(long minIntervalMillis, long maxIntervalMillis, double multiplier)
      Returns a Backoff that waits an exponentially-increasing amount of time between attempts.
      static Backoff fixed(long intervalMillis)
      Returns a Backoff that waits a fixed interval between attempts.
      long nextIntervalMillis(int numAttemptsSoFar)
      Returns the amount of time to wait before attempting a retry, in milliseconds.
      default Backoff withJitter(long minJitterMillis, long maxJitterMillis)
      Returns a Backoff that provides an interval that increases using full jitter strategy.
      default Backoff withJitter(long minJitterMillis, long maxJitterMillis, java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.Random> randomSupplier)
      Returns a Backoff that provides an interval that increases using full jitter strategy.
      default Backoff withMaxAttempts(int maxAttempts)
      Returns a Backoff which limits the number of attempts up to the specified value.
      static Backoff withoutDelay()
      Returns a Backoff that that will never wait between attempts.

    • Method Detail

      • withoutDelay

        static Backoff withoutDelay()
        Returns a Backoff that that will never wait between attempts.

      • fixed

        static Backoff fixed(long intervalMillis)
        Returns a Backoff that waits a fixed interval between attempts.

      • exponential

        static Backoff exponential(long minIntervalMillis,
                           long maxIntervalMillis)
        Returns a Backoff that waits an exponentially-increasing amount of time between attempts.

      • exponential

        static Backoff exponential(long minIntervalMillis,
                           long maxIntervalMillis,
                           double multiplier)
        Returns a Backoff that waits an exponentially-increasing amount of time between attempts.

      • nextIntervalMillis

        long nextIntervalMillis(int numAttemptsSoFar)
        Returns the amount of time to wait before attempting a retry, in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        numAttemptsSoFar - the number of attempts made by a client so far, including the first attempt and its following retries.

      • withJitter

        default Backoff withJitter(long minJitterMillis,
                           long maxJitterMillis)
        Returns a Backoff that provides an interval that increases using full jitter strategy.

      • withJitter

        default Backoff withJitter(long minJitterMillis,
                           long maxJitterMillis,
                           java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.Random> randomSupplier)
        Returns a Backoff that provides an interval that increases using full jitter strategy.

      • withMaxAttempts

        default Backoff withMaxAttempts(int maxAttempts)
        Returns a Backoff which limits the number of attempts up to the specified value.
